code:
// Press keys one by one  
await page.locator('#area').pressSequentially('Hello World!');
context: Most of the time, you should input text with [locator.fill()](/docs/api/class-locator#locator-fill). See the Text input section above. You only need to type characters if there is special keyboard handling on the page. | Type into the field character by character, as if it was a user with a real keyboard with [locator.pressSequentially()](/docs/api/class-locator#locator-press-sequentially).
